attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: Most terrible app Iâ€™ve ever downloaded! I downloaded the app to support my very kind, caring, not racist, not sexist, not bigoted, and empathetic president. But as soon as I opened the app, hardcore x-rated content was displayed! And on top of that, my grandparents, baby cousins, and my hamster were all near me when it played! There was no way to exit the app or turn down the volume of my phone, and hereâ€™s the real kicker..the app connected to my TV! So me and all of my family had to sit there, while hardcore pornography was displayed on our Samsung 98 inch LED smart TV. :( it was not a fun 4th of July evening.
attributes.title: Protect your families!

attributes.review: This app took DAYS to download and I have good WiFi. When it finally loaded it made my phone glitch so bad to the point I couldnâ€™t even text or call anyone without it exiting out. This app sends wayyy too many unnecessary notifications. Iâ€™m furious because I was looking forward to learning more about my president but it kept kicking me out of the app and when it didnâ€™t all I learned was that heâ€™s a racist, selfish, homophobic sexist that doesnâ€™t respect women and only cares about himself. Iâ€™m very disappointed in this app definitely do not recommend.
attributes.title: Despicable app

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app. And I had just got a new phone (iPhone 11 pro Max) and my phone was going super smooth! But when I opened the app. My phone started to glitch and over heat!!!! Now my phone has lines running down it and it canâ€™t go to full brightness anymore. I called Apple and they said they were not responsible because itâ€™s not there app. 
Not to mention the trump administration was absolutely no help! They basically told me that they arenâ€™t liable, even though itâ€™s their app!!!
I do not recommend this app. And seriously urge you TO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!âœ¨
